questions.question: A STATE DELEGATES ZONING POWERS TO A MUNICIPALITY THROUGH

choices.answer: THE INTERSTATE LAND SALES FULL DISCLOSURE ACT

questions.question: ALL OF THESE COULD BE INCLUDED IN A ZONING ORDINANCE EXCEPT

choices.answer: OBJECTIVES FOR FUTURE DEVELOPMENT OF THE AREAS
PERMISSIBLE HEIGHT AND STYLE OF NEW CONSTRUCTION
THE MAZIMUM ALLOWABLE RATIO OF LAND TO STRUCTURAL AREA

questions.question: WHICH OF THESE BEST DEFINES DENSITY ZONING?

choices.answer: THE AVERAGE NUMBER OF UNITS IN A DEVELOPMENT
A RESTRICTIN ON THE AVERAGE NUMBER OF HOUSES PER ACRE
A RESTRICTION ON THE AVERAGE NUMBER OF ACRES PER PARCEL

questions.question: BEFORE GRANTING A ZONING VARIANCE, A ZONING BOARD OF APPEALS MUST

choices.answer: HOLD A PUBLIC HEARING WHERE NEIGHBORS VOICE THEIR OPINIONS
CONDUCT A DOOR TO DOOR OPINION OF PROPERTY OWNERS
CHECK WHETHER THE LANDOWNERS HAS BEEN GRANTED VARIANCES
DETERMINE WHETHER THE USE WILL RESULT IN HIGHER TAXES

questions.question: ZONING ORDINANCES AFFECT ALL OF THESE EXCEPT
A DEVELOPER HAS INCLUDED A PLAYGROUND IN THE BACK OF A SUBDIVISION, THIS RECREATION AREA IS
WHEN AN AREA WAS REZONED AS RESIDENTIAL, A STORE WAS GRANDFATHERED IN. THIS IS AN EXAMPLE OF
A NEW STRUCTURE HAS BEEN COMPLETED. WHAT IS DOCUMENTATION IS NEEDED BEFORE ANYONE CAN MOVE IN?
